_source: speak;Narrator;King Hayden apologizes for being unable to spare soldiers.;;;narration
speak;Narrator;However, he does provide Eirika with a small but trusted party of vassals.;;;narration
speak;Narrator;Eirika is grateful for the king's aid.;;;narration

speak;Narrator;Chasing rumors of her brother, she sets out for Grado.{br}The group's first stop is the remote village of Ide, which was, until very recently, a part of Renais.{br}Here, Eirika sees the devasation of Renais with her own eyes.;;;narration
